entries.english: Mũhũri wa mbica (photographer - lit. hitter of pictures), Mũgĩmwĩa (hunter), Mũrĩithia wa mahĩũ (herder of domestic animals), Mũtũri (iron monger/blacksmith), Mũũmbi wa nyũngũ (potter - lit. molder of pots), Mũgo (medicine person/traditional healer), Bundi (handyman/carpenter), Mũrĩmĩ (farmer), Ndereba (driver), Mũtongoria (leader), Borithi (police), Mũbĩa (priest - Catholic)
Mũrango (door), Kabati (cupboard/cabinet), Metha (table), Ndĩrica (window), Gĩtĩ (seat/chair), Gaturwa/Njĩngwa (stool)

Verbs: Ũka (come), Andĩka (write), Rĩra (cry), Theka (laugh), Rĩa (eat), Aria (speak), Thĩĩ (go), Thooma (read), Kira (keep quiet), Ruga (cook), Ruta wĩra (do work), Ruta (remove). Nouns: Haha (here), Irio (food), Wĩra (work), Mũirĩtu (girl), Mwanake (young man), Mũtumia (woman), Mũthũuri (man), Maĩ (water), Marũa (letter), Ũcũrũ (porridge)
